#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<set>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<map>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
main()
{
	int t;
	string ip,rp;
	scanf("%d\n",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		getline(cin,ip);
		getline(cin,rp);
		for(int i=0;i<ip.length();i++)
		{
			if(ip[i]>='A'&&ip[i]<='Z')
			printf("%c",rp[ip[i]-'A']);
			else
			printf("%c",ip[i]);
		}
		cout<<"\n";
	}
}
